summary: Highly-motivated, coaching, and analytical health insurance leader.

experience.title: Customer Service Advocate
experience.description: Coached and assisted new customer service representatives; managed casework and calls; trained departments regarding PCMH.

experience.title: Missionary Pastor/Church Planter
experience.description: Assisted River Chapel in church revitalization; developed and taught discipleship curriculum; preached weekly; started a non-profit organization called The Sparrows; taught on manhood, womanhood, marriage, and parenting; roasts and sells coffee for non-profit organizations; retreat center.

experience.title: Customer Service Specialist Contractor
experience.description: Created and maintained databases tracking and trending first contact resolution; analyzed customer service calls; contributed ideas for exceptional service; evaluated data entry accuracy; followed up on unresolved issues; supported policy changes and customer satisfaction improvements.

experience.title: Outreach Pastor
experience.description: Led a team of paid staff and volunteers to focus on church outreach; spoke to groups; established relationships with local advertising; managed external marketing; organized events and guest services; facilitated Starting Point class.

experience.title: Quality Assurance Analyst
experience.description: Identified and corrected claims processing errors; evaluated data quality; followed up with customers; reported policy changes; conducted annual policy reviews; analyzed customer service calls; developed a system for first call resolution; coached and trained staff on policy changes.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Answered ~100 calls per day; described product and care details; provided an elevated customer experience; resolved inquiries and complaints; asked open-ended questions to assess needs.

experience.title: Shift Supervisor/Manager
experience.description: Ensured sales goals were met; ran daily reports; maintained customer satisfaction; interviewed potential employees; trained and mentored staff; implemented programs to increase loyalty and reduce turnover.

experience.title: Teacher and Coach
experience.description: Acted as a positive role model; taught sport-specific skills; built rapport with athletes; developed game plans; improved student participation; organized outreach programs.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Historical Theology
